page.title: 02RECREATION..ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Leisure activities in this area tend mainly to be connected with the countryside and outdoor life. Many people are interested in horse riding- there are a lot of suitable riders around the tracks in the area and local shows and gymkhanas are held all over the district. Walking and shooting are also popular outdoor pursuits here, and many people keep pets in addition to farm animals. To find any organised social activities people have to trvel to Cupar where there are pubs, discos and the swimming pool. However for more sophisticated entertainment people may go to Kirkcaldy (cinemas,skating rink and theatre) or Dundee and Edinburgh, all of which involve quite a long journey. Recently many people in this area spent a day at the{Highland Show.
